        public boolean stillWagering()
        Checks all the wager of all wagers of players at table,
        Returns:
        true if any wagers from the list of active players are equal to 0.

        public boolean checkCredits()

        Returns:
        true if there are sufficient credits, else false

      • sameAction

        public boolean sameAction(bjd_action action)
        Checks if the given dealer state is the same as the current action.
        Parameters:
        value - within the bjd_action
        Returns:
        true if action.value is same as the given value, else false.

      • resetSeating

        public void resetSeating()

      • nextSeat

        public void nextSeat(boolean noReply)
        Targets the player at the next seat, dependent on sequence and whether a reply was given. In the wager phase and a reply was given, the next player will be targeted. In the dealing phase and none/no reply, the next player will be targetd. When the last player is targeted, the target_uuid will be set to 0.
        Parameters:
        boolean - representing if a reply was received
